{"step_by_step_thinking": "Document [0] and [1] both suggest that extraction of acutely infected teeth should not be avoided and can actually be beneficial, leading to faster resolution of the infection and decreased pain. Document [21] also supports the idea that extraction can expedite recovery and minimize the risk of infection spreading.
